1100010000000101 0000010001001101 0 -> sum: 1100100001010010, cout: 0
0101101100000100 0011000000011010 0 -> sum: 1000101100011110, cout: 0
0101110001111101 0100101101111011 0 -> sum: 1010011111111000, cout: 0
1011111001011111 1101111000010111 0 -> sum: 1001110001110110, cout: 1
1110001110001000 0011000010111001 0 -> sum: 0001010001000001, cout: 1
0000011000100111 0101010101111110 1 -> sum: 0101101110100110, cout: 0

1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
1111111111111110 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111110, cout: 1
0111111111111111 1000000000000000 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
